means: 亚里斯多德的，亚里斯多德学派的

sentence.Network_en: The goal of Aristotelian science was to explain why things happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚里士多德科学旨在解释万物产生之因.

sentence.Network_en: The famous Aristotelian distinction between distributive and corrective justice will be discussed elsewhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚里士多德对分配正义与平均正义的著名区分拟另作讨论.

sentence.Network_en: This conclusion did not agree with the generally accepted opinion of Aristotelian philosophy at that time.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个结论与当时公认的亚里士多德学说不一致.
